A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I've been a Star Wars fan since I was 2 and saw the original at a drive-in in 1977. While this isn't my favorite Star Wars movie\, I certainly like how it shook things up within the saga.  \nI have some minor quibbles\, I think the Canto Bright subplot had some pacing and story issues\, for example\, but this is a worthy installment.
